snippet: The release of Saeed Mortazavi, the imprisoned aide to President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, marked a new turn in a fight between the president and Iran’s most influential political family.
abstract: Release of Saeed Mortazavi, imprisoned aide to Iran's Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, marks new turn in fight between president and Iran’s most influential political family.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The release of Saeed Mortazavi, the imprisoned aide to President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, marked a new turn in a fight between the president and Iran’s most influential political family.

headline.seo: Presidential Aide Freed, Reports Say, as Top Iranian Politicians Trade Accusations
headline.main: Presidential Aide Freed, Reports Say, as Top Iranian Politicians Trade Accusations
